input.sentences: his family was watching from the stands .
output.sentences: It was finally time for the male soccer team to start playing.
They chased the ball all over the field while trying to strategically out think the opposing team.
In the stands, Martin saw his family watching and waving as he ran across the field.
He had been practicing running for years, with five and ten mile runs everyday.
Every soccer game was exciting to him, no matter the outcome at the end of the day.
